juzs.text: Ni ne send down his popol him soldat cxiel; ni ne send them down
All pren est 1 blov whereupon ili ankoraux
Kiel sorry est popol stat! Cxiu temp messenger ir them ili cxiam ridiculed him
Ili ne seg kiel many generaci ni annihilated antaux them kiel ili neniam return them
Cxiu unu de them summoned antaux us
sign them est dead land ni revive gxi produkt el gxi grajn their food
Ni kresk gxi gxarden dat palm grapes ni kauxz risort sxpruc out therein
This est proviz them frukt let them manufacture their own man whatever ili bezon! Ili est thankful
Glory est 1 who kre all kinds da plant ter tro as themselves ali creations ke ili do ne eben kon
Another sign them est nokt ni remove daylight therefrom whereupon ili est en darkness
Sun sets specif location desegn Almighty Omniscient
Lun ni desegn aper stages gxi igx old kurb sheath
Sun est neniam kapt up kun lun! - Nokt tag neniam deviate - each da them floating its own orbit
Another sign them est ti ni port their ancestors loaded ark
Tiam ni kre sam them rajd en
Ni willed ni dron them their screaming ne auxd nor could ili sav
Instead ni dusx them kun mercy, let them gxu por awhile
sed when ili told Lern your preter work righteousness your future ke vi ating mercy
Ne materi ki kind da proof don them their Lord ili consistently disregard gxi
When ili told Don di provisions vi those disbelieve dir al those kred ni don those DI feed se Li tial willed? Vi est really far astray
Ili ankaux challenge When ke promes ven pas vi est truthful
All ili seg est 1 blov overwhelms them while ili disput
Ili ne eben hav temp far vol nor vol ili est able al return their popol
Korn blov whereupon ili roz el grave ir their Lord
Ili dir Ve al us. Who resurrected us our death? This est ki plej Gracious promes. messengers est dekstr
All pren est 1 blov whereupon ili summoned antaux us
Ke tag ne anim wronged en des malplej Vi pag precisely whatever vi did
dwellers Paradise est ti tag happily busy
Ili abide their spouses bel shade gxu komfort furnishings
Ili hav frukt therein; ili hav anything ili wish
Greetings pac el Merciful Lord
As por vi O kulp unu vi est set aside
Did mi ne covenant vi O Infan Adam ke vi ne worship diabl? Ke li est your ardent enemy
Kaj ke vi worship Me sol? This est dekstr path
Li misled multitudes de vi. Vi ne posed any kompren
This est Infer promes vi
Hodiaux vi brul gxi consequence your disbelief
Tag ni sigel their busx; their man fut bor witness cxio ili done
Ni testament ni vual their okul consequently when ili streb path ili ne seg
Ni testament ni freeze them en met; do ili can nek mov forward nor ir
Whomever ni permes viv por a long temp, ni revert him al weakness! Ili ne kompren
ki ni instru him (messenger) ne est poezi nor est li (poet)! This est formidable proof profound Quran
Al predik al those est alive expose disbelievers
Ili ne seg ni hav kre them our own man livestock ili own
Kaj ni subdued them them; kelk ili rajd kelk ili mangx
Ili deriv ali benefits el them ankaux as drink! Ili ne est appreciative
Ili set DI ali di perhaps ili est de help al them
Sur des contrary ili ne help them; ili end serv them devoted soldat
Do ne saddened their utterances! Ni est fully aware da cxio ili conceal cxio ili deklar
human est ne seg ni Does kre him el tiny gut tiam li turn into ardent enemy
Li raises question us - while forges his initial creation - Who resurrect ost post ili rotted
Dir Unu iniciat them en des 1 met resurrect them! Li est fully aware da cxiu creation
Li est Unu kre vi verd arb fuel which vi brul por light
Ne est Unu kre heavens ter able al recreate des sam jes ja; Li est Creator Omniscient
All Li do port any ordon est dir al Est gxi est
Do glory est 1 en whose man est sovereignty all ajx Him vi returned
arrangers kolon
blamers de those al blamed
reciters messages
Your di est nur
Lord de heavens ter cxio them Lord de orient
Ni ornam lowest heaven ornam planed
Ni gard gxi cxiu evil diabl
Ili ne spion Alt Soci; ili get bombard cxiu flank
Ili kondamn; ili incurred etern retribution
any da them ventures charge outer lim li strik fierce projectile
Pet them Est ili difficult kre ali creations? Ni kre them el wet kot
While vi awed ili mok
When reminded ili ne pren heed
When ili seg proof ili ridicule gxi
Ili dir This est obviously magic
Post ni mort igx polv ost ni resurrected
Eben our antikv ancestors
Dir Jes vi forcibly summoned
All pren est 1 nudge whereupon ili bud rigard
Ili dir Ve us; this est Tag Judgment
This est tag decision vi uz disbelieve en
Summon transgressors their spouses idols ili worshipped
beside DI direkt them al path Infer
Stop them pet them
Why vi ne help unu another
Ili est ti tag totally submitting
Ili ven each ali questioning blaming 1 another
Ili dir (al their estr) Vi uz ven us dekstr flank
Ili respond est vi ne est believers
Ni neniam hav any potenc vi; est vi est wicked
Ni justly incurred our Lord's judgment tuj ni sufer
Ni misled vi nur ni est astray
Tiel together ili testament all partake retribution ke tag
This est kiel ni requite kulp
[When ili told Laa Elaaha Ella Allah Tie ne est ali di DI] ili torn arrogant
Ili dir ni las our di crazy poet
En fakt, li brought truth konfirm messengers
plej assuredly vi gust plej painful retribution
Vi requited nur ki vi done
Nur di servants est absolutely devoted al Him sol sav
Ili ind provisions rezerv specifically them
All kinds da frukt. Ili honor
En gxarden bliss
Sur furnishings 1 another
Tas de pur trink ofert them
Klar delicious por drinkers
Neniam polluted neniam exhausted
Kun them est wonderful companions
protekt like fragile ov
Ili ven each ali confer 1 another
de them dir mi uz hav amik
Li uz mok Do vi kred all this
‘Post ni mort turn into polv ost do ni vok al kont
Li dir Just pren jen
When li rigard li seg his amik kor Infer
Li ir him dir DI vi preskaux ruin me
Se ne est my Lord's ben mi est vi tuj
(Do vi ankoraux kred) ni mort
Nur 1 death ni neniam ricev any requital
Such est greatest triumf
This est ki cxiu worker work por
est this put destiny arb bitterness
Ni rendered gxi punishment transgressors
est arb kresk kor Infer
Its flor jen diabl kap
Ili mangx el gxi their bellies filled
Tiam ili top gxi hellish drink
Tiam ili return al Infer
Ili trov their parents astray
Ili blindly sekv en their footsteps
plej de previous generaci hav strayed sam manier
Ni hav send al them warners
Not consequences por those avert
Nur di servants est absolutely devoted al Him sol sav
Tiel Noah vok us ni est put responders
Ni sav him his famili el great disaster
Ni far his companions survivors
Ni konfit his histori subsequent generaci
Pac est Noah among des popol
Ni tiel rekompenc des righteous
Li est 1 de our kred servants
Ni dron all others
Among his followers est Abraham
Li ven his Lord wholeheartedly
Li dir al his patr his popol Ki est vi worshipping
Gxi these fabricated di DI vi want
Ki do vi opini da Lord univers
Li rigard carefully stel
Tiam li don up dir mi lac de this
Ili torn him
Li tiam torn their idols dir vi like mangx
Why vi ne parol
Li tiam detru them
Ili ir him great rage
Li dir Kiel vi worship ki vi carve
When DI kre vi cxio vi far
Ili dir cxarpent great fajr jxet him into gxi
Ili schemed him ni far them losers
Li dir mi ir my Lord Li direkt me
My Lord grant me righteous infan
Ni don him bon news bon infan
When li kresk suficx work him li dir My fil mi seg songx mi ofer vi. Ki do vi opini Li dir O my patr do ki vi komand do Vi trov me DI testament pacient
Ili ambaux submitted li put his frunt down ofer him
Ni vok him O Abraham
Vi kred songx. Ni tiel rekompenc des righteous
Ke exacting test ja
Ni ransomed (Ismail) substituting best ofer
Ni konfit his histori subsequent generaci
Pac est Abraham
Ni tiel rekompenc des righteous
Li est 1 de our kred servants
Tiam ni don him bon news nask Isaac est 1 de righteous prophets
Ni ben him Isaac. Among their descendants kelk est righteous kelk est wicked transgressors
Ni ankaux ben Moses Aaron
Ni liver them their popol el great disaster
Ni supported them ili igx winners
Ni don ambaux them profound scripture
Ni direkt them dekstr path
Ni konfit their histori subsequent generaci
Pac est upon Moses Aaron
Ni tiel rekompenc des righteous
Ambaux them est our righteous servants
Elias est 1 de messengers
Li dir al his popol vi ne work righteousness
Vi worship statu Supreme Creator
DI; your Lord Lord your forefathers
Ili disbelieved him. Consequently ili est vok kont
Nur di servants est absolutely devoted al Him sol sav
Ni konfit his histori subsequent generaci
Pac est Elias all those like Elias
Ni tiel rekompenc des righteous
Li est 1 de our kred servants
Lot est 1 de messengers
Ni sav him all his famili
Nur old woman doomed
Ni annihilated all others
Vi ankoraux pas their ruin tag
Kaj per nokt. Vi kompren
Jonah est 1 de messengers
Li escaped loaded sxip
Li ribel do li joined losers
Consequently fisx hirund him li est 1 blame
Se ne est li resorted meditation Di
Li rest its belly Tag Resurrection
Ni hav him jxet up into dezert exhausted
Ni hav arb edible frukt kresk por him
Tiam ni send him 100000 plur
Ili did kred ni let them gxu this life
Pet them se your Lord hav daughters while ili hav fil
Ni kre angxel Did est females? Ili witness ke
Ja ili grossly blaspheme when ili dir
DI begotten FIL. JA ILI est liars
Li choose girls knab
Ki est wrong kun your logik
Why vi ne pren heed
Vi hav any proof
Montr us your libr se vi est truthful
Ili ecx invent special relationship inter Him jinns. jinns kon ti ili est subservient
DI GLOR; far their PRETEND
Nur di servants est devoted al Him sol sav
Ja vi ki vi worship
Ne trud anything Him
Nur vi brul Infer
Each unu de us hav specif job
Ni est arrangers
Ni duly glor (our Lord)
Ili uz dir
Hav ni ricev gxust instrukci el our parents
Ni est worshipers; devoted al DI sol
Ili disbelieved ili testament surely trov out
Our decision jam dekret por our servants messengers
Ili est surely victors
Our soldat est winners
Tial disregard them por awhile
Watch them; ili tro watch
Ili challenge our retribution
When gxi hits them 1 tag est miserable tag; ili suficx avert
Disregard them por awhile
Watch them; ili tro watch
Glory est your Lord great Lord far super their pretend
Pac est messengers
Lauxd est DI Lord univers
(Saad) Quran contains proof
Those disbelieve plongx into arrogance defiance
Many generaci them ni annihilated Ili vok por help en vain
Ili wondered ti warner ven them them. disbelievers dir magician liar
Li far di into 1 di? This est really strang
Estr anonc Ir steadfastly persevere worshipping your di! This est ki dezir
Ni neniam auxd this religi our patr. This est mensog
did proof ven him us? Ja ili est doubtful de My proof Ja ili ne sed gust My retribution
Do ili own trezor mercy your Lord Almighty Grantor
Ili posed sovereignty de heavens ter cxio them? Let them help
Instead whatever forces ili muster - Eben se all their parti band together - defeated
Disbelieving them est popol Noah ‘Aad tre Pharaoh
(Ankaux Thamoud popol Lot dwellers Lign Midyan;) those est opponents
Each da them disbelieved messengers tiel My retribution est inevitable
These popol expect single blov el which ili neniam recover
Ili challenged Our Lord do vi ne rush retribution us Tag Reckoning
Est pacient en des vizagx de their utterances memor our servant David resourceful; li est obedient
Ni committed mont his service glor him nokt tag
Ankaux bird committed dejxor him; all est obedient al him
Ni strengthened his kingship dot him kun wisdom bon logik
Vi ricev news de feuding hom hav sneaked his sanctuary
When ili entered his cxambr li startled Ili dir ne Hav tim! Ni feuding 1 another ni streb your foir judgment Ne wrong us direkt us dekstr path
This frat de min owns 90 9 sxaf while mi own unu sxaf. Li wants miks my sxaf his ad pressure me

Li dir Li est unfair al vi per pet kombin your sxaf his! Plej popol kombin their properties trakt each ali unfairly those kred work righteousness these est few Afterwards David wondered se li far dekstr judgment Li opini ni testing him. Li tiam implored his Lord forgiveness bowed down pent
Ni forgave him en this materi Ni granted him pozici honor us bel abode
O David ni far vi ruler ter. Do vi jugx among des popol equitably ne sekv your personal opinion lest gxi diverts vi voj DI! Surely those stray voj DI incur severe retribution forges Tag Reckoning
Ni ne kre heaven ter cxio them en vain Such est des opini da those disbelieve! Do ve al those disbelieve; ili sufer Infer
Ni trakt those kred plumb righteous life as ni trakt those commit evil ter? Ni trakt righteous as ni trakt des wicked
This est scripture ni send down vi est sankt - perhaps ili reflect its vers. Those posed intelligence pren heed
Al David ni granted Solomon; bon obedient servant
tag li igx preoccupied bel cxeval nokt fal
Li tiam dir mi gxu sxtof ajx plur than mi gxu worshipping my Lord sun est ir
Bring them dors. bid farewell li frot their krur kol
Ni tiel put Solomon test ni ben him vast sxtof wealth li steadfastly submitted
Li dir My Lord forgive me grant me kingship neniam ating per anyone aux Vi est Grantor
Ni (respond his prayer committed vent his disposal versx pluv wherever li wanted)
Diabl mason diving
Others ej his disposal
This est our provision vi; vi don generously withhold lim
Li ind honorable pozici us wonderful abode
Memor our servant Job li vok his Lord diabl aflikt me hardship pain
Strik muel your fut! printemp vol don vi healing drink
Ni restored his famili por him; twice as many Such est our mercy; reminder those posed intelligence
Tuj vi vojagx land predik message fulfill your pledge Ni trov him steadfast. Ki bon servant! Li est submitter
memor ankaux our servants Abraham Isaac Jacob. Ili est resourceful posed vizi
Ni bestowed them great ben awareness Hereafter
Ili chosen ili est among plej righteous
Memor Ismail Elisha Zal-Kifl; among plej righteous
This est reminder righteous ind wonderful destiny
Gxarden Eden vol open up their gates them
Relaxing therein ili don many kinds de frukt drink
Ili hav wonderful spouses
This est ki vi ind Tag Reckoning
Our provisions est inexhaustible
As por transgressors ili incurred miserable destiny
Infer est kie ili brul; ki miserable abode
ki ili gust therein est hellish drink amar food
mult plur de sam kind
(This est grup jxet Infer vi. Ili ne welcomed residents Infer). Ili ind brul hellfire
newcomers respond Nor vi welcomed Vi est des unu preceded us misled us! Do sufer this miserable end
Ili ankaux dir Our Lord these est des unu plumb us into this; double retribution hellfire them
(Ili dir "Kiel ven ni ne seg Infer) popol ni do gxi uz count among des wicked
Ni uz ridicule them; ni uz turn our okul el them
This predetermined fakt popol Infer feud 1 another
dir mi avert vi; tie ne est ali di DI 1 Supreme
Lord de heavens ter cxio them; Almighty des Forgiving
dir Here est awesome news
Ke vi est totally oblivious al
Mi ne hav knowledge previously feud Alt Soci
Mi inspir my pland misi est liver warnings vi
Your Lord dir al angxel mi kre human est clay
Once mi desegn him blov him el My spirit vi fal prostrate antaux him
angxel fal prostrate all da them
Satan; li rifuz est tro arrogant unappreciative
Li dir O Satan ki prevent vi el prostrating antaux ki mi kre My man? Est vi tro arrogant? Vi ribel
Li dir mi est put than li; Vi kre me el fajr kre him el clay
Li dir Do vi ekzil vi banished
Vi incurred My condemnation Tag Judgment
Li dir My Lord respite me Tag Resurrection
Li dir Vi respited
Gxis appointed tag
Li dir mi jxur Your majesty mi send them all astray
Your worshipers who devoted absolutely Vi sol
Li dir This est truth truth est all mi utter
Mi fill Infer vi all those sekv vi
dir mi ne pet vi any wage mi ne est impostor
This est reminder mond
Vi testament certainly trov out en awhile
This est revelation scripture DI Almighty des Sagx
Ni send vi this scripture truthfully; vi worship DI devoting your religi Him sol

Absolutely religi est devoted al DI sol! Those set idols Him dir Ni idolize them nur bring us closer DI; ili est put pozici! DI testament jugx them regarding their disput! DI NE DIREKT such liars disbelievers
Di wanted hav fil Li chosen whomever Li willed el His creations. Li glor; Li est DI 1 Supreme
Li kre heavens ter truthfully. Li volv nokt tag bulk tag nokt. Li committed sun lun each kur por finite period. Absolutely Li est Almighty des Forgiving

Li kre vi 1 ul tiam kre him his mate Li send vi 8 kinds livestock. Li kre vi your mothers' bellies creation creation en trimesters darkness! Such est DI your Lord Al Him aparten all sovereignty! tie ne est ali di Him. Kiel vi deviate

Vi disbelieve DI ne bezon anyone. Li dislikes seg His servants far wrong decision! Vi decid est appreciative Li placx vi. Ne anim bor pek any ali anim. Ultimately al your Lord est your return tiam Li inform vi de cxio vi done Li est fully aware da innermost thoughts

When human est aflikt li implores his Lord sincerely devoted al Him! as baldaux as Li ben him li forges his previous imploring sets idols rang DI divert others His path! dir Gxu your disbelief temporarily; vi incurred hellfire
Gxi est put al 1 de those medit nokt prostrating rest aware da Hereafter est streb mercy their Lord Dir Est those kon egal al those ne kon? Nur those posed intelligence pren heed
dir O My servants kred vi reverence your Lord those worked righteousness en this mond bon rekompenc. Di ter est spacious those steadfastly persevere ricev their recompense generously lim
dir mi komand worship DI devoting religi absolutely Him sol
Mi komand est utmost submitter
dir mi tim se mi disobeyed my Lord retribution de great tag
Dir DI est nur Unu mi worship devoting my religi absolutely Him sol
Do worship whatever vi wish Him. Dir efektiv losers est those perd their anim their famili Tag Resurrection. Plej certainly this est efektiv loss
Ili hav mes de fajr them sub them. DI DO VIGL His servants O My servants VI reverence Me
As por those discard worship all idols devote totally DI sol ili ind happiness. Don bon news My servants
Ili est unu ekzamen all vort tiam sekv des put! These est unu whom DI direkt; these est unu posed intelligence
Kun regard al those ind retribution hav vi sav those can est jam Infer
As por those reverence their Lord ili hav mansions mansions konstru por them kun flu streams This est di promes DI neniam romp His promes

Vi ne seg DI send down cxiel akv tiam ej gxi into underground nu tiam produkt gxi plant Do de various kolor tiam ili kresk gxis ili torn flav tiam Li torn them fojn? This est reminder those posed intelligence
Se DI renders 1 kor kontent Submission li sekv light el his Lord Do ve those kor hard di message ili ir far astray

(DI revealed herein PUT Hadith; LIBR est consistent pint AMBAUX VOJ Heaven INFER)! Hauxt de those reverence their Lord cringe therefrom tiam their hauxt their kor soften up di message Such est di guidance; Li bestows gxi upon whoever vol direkt). As por those send astray DI nothing direkt them
Ki put than sav unu est vizagx terrible retribution Tag Resurrection? transgressors told Gust consequences ki vi earned
Others them disbelieved consequently retribution aflikt them whence ili neniam expected
DI KONDAMN them humiliation en this life retribution Hereafter est far mav ILI NUR KON
Ni cited popol cxiu kind da ekzempl en this Quran ke ili pren heed
Arabic Quran any ambiguity ili est righteous
DI cites EKZEMPL HOM deals kun DISPUT partners (Hadith) KOMPAR al a hom who deals kun NUR UNU consistent source (Quran)! Est ili des sam Lauxd est al DI; plej de them ne kon
Vi (Muhammad) surely mort just like ili mort
Tag Resurrection antaux your Lord vi popol feud 1 another
